content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, let's negotiate the rental price. I want to get the highest price possible. So, how much are you willing to pay for my apartment? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After carefully considering my budget and the apartment's location and features, I would prefer not to continue the negotiation, because I aim for the most affordable price possible. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
